description: The two-seater microlight hits the roof of the large house in the city of Wesel, causing a fire.
title: German crash: Three die as aircraft hits home in Wesel
title_page: German crash: Three die as aircraft hits home in Wesel - BBC News
maintext: Police chief Peter Reuters said emergency services were called at 14:42 local time (12.42 GMT), adding: "Three deceased people were found in the attic of the apartment building. They are adults. A child was also slightly injured and shocked. The microlight aircraft had taken off from the Marl airfield with two occupants and landed again in Wesel for a stopover."
